_comment: SecondMind Configuration – All models via OpenRouter Cloud
_docs: See README.md for full configuration reference

models._strategy: Cheapest model that gets the job done. Override per role as needed.
models._warning: Models that are too small will cause JSON parsing errors. Stick to the recommended models.

extraction._why: Fastest and cheapest for structured JSON extraction. 1M context.

initiative._why: Best reasoning per dollar. DeepSeek V3 / 3.2 recommended. For deeper: deepseek/deepseek-reasoner

flush._why: Must be fast – runs inline before session reset

rerank._why: Replaces vector embeddings. FTS5 + LLM reranking = cheaper + more portable

dedup._why: Short JSON response for duplicate check. Sees max 10 candidates from FTS prefilter.
